messageBody:
> From IDEA, I can use something like cpsuite (JUnit 4 tests)
> or JUnit Addons' DirectorySuiteBuilder (JUnit 3 tests). But
> there's no way to run all tests across all modules, excluding
> "*Online*", unless the JetBrains folks implement this feature
> (http://www.jetbrains.net/jira/browse/IDEA-13558).
>
> I'm not entirely sure what Eclipse does to run tests across modules.
> I suspect it has similar limitations.

If by "modules" you mean what Eclipse calls "projects"
then I don't think there's any way to do this. Projects
has different settings (including classpaths), may come
from different source repositories, etc. I don't think
it really fits in the Eclipse project paradigm to run
tests from different projects all within the same test
suite/group/run/whatever.


Todd.
